attributes.action: Abolish Uber app in London and eliminate sexual assaults on female passengers.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.whosdrivingyou.org/rideshare-incidents
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/uber-drivers-accused-of-32-rapes-and-sex-attacks-on-london-passengers-a7037926.html

TfL refuse to give out the total figures of sexual assaults in an uber vehicle.
attributes.background: Black cabs are safe licensed and fully insured how ever Uber is not licensed and only has third party insurance most of these uber drivers cancel there insurance and don't get checked until their insurance is reviewed in 6 months.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of the London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with the London Assembly using the link below:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
